name: action-bar
description: Floating action toolbar for bulk actions on selected items

props.name: open
props.description: Whether the action bar is visible

props.name: onOpenChange
props.description: Callback when the open state changes

props.name: onEscapeKeyDown
props.description: Callback when the Escape key is pressed

props.name: align
props.description: Horizontal alignment of the action bar

props.name: alignOffset
props.description: Offset from the aligned edge in pixels

props.name: side
props.description: Which side of the viewport to position the bar

props.name: sideOffset
props.description: Offset from the side edge in pixels
